topic.title: SEXUAL HEALTH AND HIV ACTIVITY HEALTH ISSUE (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: SEXUAL HEALTH AND HIV ACTIVITY HEALTH ISSUE (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT EXPRESSION which is used to record a health issue identified at an attendance for a Sexual Health Service.
